suite.name: Gherkin Login

test.name: Valid Login

kw.name: Given browser is opened to login page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
WebDriverException: Message: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/home

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: When user "demo" logs in with password "mode"
Then welcome page should be open
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: WebDriverException: Message: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/home

suite.doc:
A test suite with a single Gherkin style test.
This test is functionally identical to the example in valid_login.robot file.

suite.doc:
A test suite containing tests related to invalid login.
These tests are data-driven by their nature. They use a single keyword, specified with Test Template setting, that is called with different arguments to cover different scenarios.
This suite also demonstrates using setups and teardowns in different levels.
suite.status: Suite setup failed: WebDriverException: Message: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/home

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |
